item.title: HOOD
item.description: score:-37 Chances: Cryptocurrency prices rose early Monday, and spot bitcoin ETFs jumped as bitcoin climbed back above $72,000. Five Bitcoin-Centric stocks for investment are: NVDA, COIN, HOOD, CLSK, IBKR. Retail engagement materially accelerated in the first quarter. Risks: The online brokerage faces a lot of near-term challenges.
